legend_0020_friend_01: Watch your step. It’s pretty dark...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_03:
This is one of the Herba Mystica! It’s exactly how
it looked in the book![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_system_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You and Arven found the
[VAR COLOR(0008)][VAR ITEM2(0001)][VAR COLOR(0000)]!
legend_0020_friend_04:
YES! We actually found one! And it’s all thanks to
you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_05:
Now then, let’s see... What does the book have
to say?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_a:
It says here that the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Sweet Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)] is good
for gut health and that it helps aid digestion.\c
Says it’s great for stomachaches too, or when
you want to stimulate the ol’ appetite![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_b:
Well, apparently [VAR COLOR(0006)]Salty Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)] helps with
aching hands and feet. Good for neuropathy and\r
numbness.\c
When you’ve got muscle weakness, it supposedly
builds up strength again![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_c:
[VAR COLOR(0006)]Bitter Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)]’s great for your circulation!
It really gets the blood flowing!\c
And that warms you right up, nice and toasty,
even boosting the immune system!\c
...Or so it says.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_d:
OK, [VAR COLOR(0006)]Sour Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)] is chock-full of nutrients
and is great for boosting your overall health!\c
Says here it works wonders whether you’re tired
physically or mentally. Perks you right up![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_e:
So it seems [VAR COLOR(0006)]Spicy Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)]’s supposed to
boost your metabolism!\c
It gives your circulation a boost and helps flush
out all those toxins...along with a ton of sweat![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_06: Now if I can just get him to eat some...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_07:
All right! Now it’s my turn to show off what I can
do. You’re about to get a taste of my cooking![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_08:
Here you go!\c
An Arven-original sandwich packed full of herbs![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_09:
And I’ll even give you a badge—y’know, as a
thank-you for taking on that Titan Pokémon.\c
I call it a Titan Badge. Made it myself, using a
replica of the Gym Badges, see?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_10:
Argh! What’s up with that thing?! It just comes
out of its ball on its own whenever it wants?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_11: ...Hey now. No. That’s not for you.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_system_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Do you want to give your sandwich
to [VAR PKNAME(0001)]?
legend_0020_system_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Maybe you want to give your sandwich to
[VAR PKNAME(0001)]\r
after all?
legend_0020_friend_12:
Hey! I went through all the trouble of making
that for you, and you just give it away?![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_13:
I hope you realize that’s all there was, so now
there’s none left for you...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_14a:
Aw, come on! Now you’re making me feel like
I’m the selfish jerk here![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_14b: All right, all right! Don’t look at me like that![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_15:
Here, you can have half of mine. But you’d better
savor every last bite![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_16: Huh? You already ate that whole thing?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_system_04: [VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to dash now!
legend_0020_system_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to jump
higher now!
legend_0020_system_06: [VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to glide now!
legend_0020_system_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to move across the
water now!
legend_0020_system_08:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to climb up
vertical\r
surfaces\r
now!
legend_0020_friend_17:
Wha—?! Hey, is it me or has this thing sort of...
powered up somehow?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_18:
Whoa! I can’t believe it! The power of these
herbs really is worth guarding![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_19:
If they had that big an effect on your Pokémon,
then I bet—[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_20:
Uhhh... I bet it’ll come in super handy for that
Treasure Hunt assignment we’ve got!\c
Yup! That’s what I bet![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_21:
Well, you’ve both filled your bellies with some
of my legendary sandwiches![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_22: Guess it’s time to tidy everything up...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_23:
Oh, don’t you worry about helping! After battling
the Titan, you’ve earned a break![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0020_friend_24:
Just leave all this to me! Though I’d be much
obliged if you’d get a start on searching out the\r
remaining four Herba Mystica for us.[VAR 0114(0006)]
